Product Name: Anti-Pigment Dual Serum

Key Ingredients: Thiamidol, Hyaluronic Acid, Licochalcone A

Problems Solved: Effectively reduces pigment spots and prevents their re-appearance, hyperpigmentation, dark spots, uneven skin, fine lines, wrinkles

Descriptions: A dual serum with Thiamidol®, Hyaluronic Acid and Licochalcone A that reduces all types of dark spots and smoothen fine lines for firmer skin feeling. It acts at the root cause of hyperpigmentation by reducing melanin production, helps skin attract and retain moisture, reduces inflammation, neutralizes free radicals, and protects skin from sun-induced effects. It absorbs quickly, spreads easily, and is non-sticky.
